name: refinned
description: Refined version of the default Jellyfin theme

scripts.build: sass src/main.scss dist/refinned.css && postcss dist/refinned.css --use cssnano --output dist/refinned.min.css
scripts.build:dev: sass src/main.scss dev/refinned.css && postcss dev/refinned.css --use cssnano --output dev/refinned.min.css

author: Jesse Kaufman <jesse@jessekaufman.com>
